animeDescription: By day, Romeo Maki is a respectable man who loves bringing gifts to the local orphanage, and Juliet is a newly employed nun working at said orphanage. However, by night, they are Masked Man M and Lady S, popular professional wrestlers. Kick-Heart tells the story of what happens when this dynamic pair meet in the ring, the only place where they can express their hidden desires.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]
animeVoices: ['Honda, Takako', 'Suzuki, Tatsuhisa', 'Matsumoto, Shinobu', 'Satou, Miyuki', 'Nitta, Makiko', 'Kanuka, Mitsuaki', 'Takagi, Wataru']
